item.title: Contribution Guidelines
item.description: Subscribe our mailing list sending an email to dev-subscribe@openserverless.apache.org Discuss your contribution and get a ticket assigned in our [Issue Tracker](https://github.com/apache/openserverless/issues) setup your virtual machine as described [here](https://github.com/apache/openserverless) . Learn about [git submodules](https://git-scm.com/book/en/v2/Git-Tools-Submodules) (we use them), and use the script update-tree.sh to update your source tree to the latest version of all the branches. Fork the subrepo you want to contribute and code your contribution. Download and sign the [ICLA](https://www.
